languages.text: "Да-да, о почтенная дамаар, давай уже сюда грамоту, да поскорее!" {n}Джай пробегает глазами по Меркатум Табула Официале и заливается смехом.{/n} "Слава Великому, что позволил пережить все мучения, шерин! Да о таком можно внукам рассказывать — простая смертная и стала торговым представителем Империума! Не будем более докучать дамаар, шерин. Почему бы нам не обсудить дальнейшие планы на корабле?"

traits.locale_text: "Да-да, о почтенная дамаар, давай уже сюда грамоту, да поскорее!" {n}Джай пробегает глазами по Меркатум Табула Официале и заливается смехом.{/n} "Слава Великому, что позволил пережить все мучения, шерин! Да о таком можно внукам рассказывать — простая смертная и стала торговым представителем Империума! Не будем более докучать дамаар, шерин. Почему бы нам не обсудить дальнейшие планы на корабле?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"
languages.original_text: "Да-да, о почтенная дамаар, давай уже сюда грамоту, да поскорее!" {n}Джай пробегает глазами по Меркатум Табула Официале и заливается смехом.{/n} "Слава Великому, что позволил пережить все мучения, шерин! Да о таком можно внукам рассказывать — простая смертная и стала торговым представителем Империума! Не будем более докучать дамаар, шерин. Почему бы нам не обсудить дальнейшие планы на корабле?"

This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “没问题，没问题，尊敬的大师。快把执照给我吧，来吧！”{n}婕伊瞟了一眼帝国官方行商执照，双眼中闪烁着喜悦的光芒。{/n}“赞美至高无上的神皇！祂见证了我所有的考验，亲爱的！等我有了孙子，我一定要好好给他们讲讲这个故事，告诉他们一介卑微的凡人怎么当上了帝国官方贸易代表！咱们就别再打扰这位大师了，亲爱的。不如先回到船上，讨论咱们接下来的计划吧？”
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: “没问题，没问题，尊敬的大师。快把执照给我吧，来吧！”{n}婕伊瞟了一眼帝国官方行商执照，双眼中闪烁着喜悦的光芒。{/n}“赞美至高无上的神皇！祂见证了我所有的考验，亲爱的！等我有了孙子，我一定要好好给他们讲讲这个故事，告诉他们一介卑微的凡人怎么当上了帝国官方贸易代表！咱们就别再打扰这位大师了，亲爱的。不如先回到船上，讨论咱们接下来的计划吧？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Sí, sí, estimada damaar! ¡Deme ya el certificado, vamos!» {n}Jae estudia feliz la Mercatum Tabula Officiale con ojos brillantes.{/n} «¡Alabado sea el Exaltado por guiarme a través de estas pruebas, shereen! Esto es algo que contar a mis nietos: ¡cómo una humilde mortal pasó a ser representante comercial del Imperium! No molestemos más a la damaar, shereen. ¿Por qué no hablamos de nuestros siguientes pasos en la nave?».
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí, sí, estimada damaar! ¡Deme ya el certificado, vamos!» {n}Jae estudia feliz la Mercatum Tabula Officiale con ojos brillantes.{/n} «¡Alabado sea el Exaltado por guiarme a través de estas pruebas, shereen! Esto es algo que contar a mis nietos: ¡cómo una humilde mortal pasó a ser representante comercial del Imperium! No molestemos más a la damaar, shereen. ¿Por qué no hablamos de nuestros siguientes pasos en la nave?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「分かっているわ、お偉いダマール。さっさと認定書をちょうだいってば、ほら！」{n}ジェイの瞳はメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを一心不乱に見つめ、喜びで輝いている。{/n}「この試練を越えたあたしを見守ってくれたエグザルテッド・ワンを称えましょう、ね、シャリーン！孫にまで話せるわね、これは―こんなに身分が低い人間が、帝国の貿易代表者なのよ！もうお偉いダマールを困らせることはないわ。次はどうするか、船で話しましょう」
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: 「分かっているわ、お偉いダマール。さっさと認定書をちょうだいってば、ほら！」{n}ジェイの瞳はメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを一心不乱に見つめ、喜びで輝いている。{/n}「この試練を越えたあたしを見守ってくれたエグザルテッド・ワンを称えましょう、ね、シャリーン！孫にまで話せるわね、これは―こんなに身分が低い人間が、帝国の貿易代表者なのよ！もうお偉いダマールを困らせることはないわ。次はどうするか、船で話しましょう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est bon, j'ai compris, vénérable damaar. Donnez-moi vite ce document, qu'on en finisse ! » {n}Les yeux de Jae s'illuminent de joie à la vue de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale.{/n} « Loué soit l'Exalté pour m'avoir aidée à venir à bout de cette épreuve, shereen ! Moi, une humble mortelle nommée représentante commerciale de l'Imperium... Ça me fera une belle histoire à raconter à mes petits-enfants ! Sur ce, ne dérangeons pas plus longtemps la damaar. Nous discuterons de la suite à donner à tout ça une fois à bord du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est bon, j'ai compris, vénérable damaar. Donnez-moi vite ce document, qu'on en finisse ! » {n}Les yeux de Jae s'illuminent de joie à la vue de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale.{/n} « Loué soit l'Exalté pour m'avoir aidée à venir à bout de cette épreuve, shereen ! Moi, une humble mortelle nommée représentante commerciale de l'Imperium... Ça me fera une belle histoire à raconter à mes petits-enfants ! Sur ce, ne dérangeons pas plus longtemps la damaar. Nous discuterons de la suite à donner à tout ça une fois à bord du vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, ja, geschätzte Damaar, jetzt gebt mir endlich das Zertifikat, na los!" {n}Jae überfliegt das Mercatum Tabula Officiale, und ihre Augen glitzern vor Freude.{/n} "Gepriesen sei der Erhabene, der mich durch all diese Prüfungen getragen hat, Shereen! Davon können wir später den Enkeln erzählen – wie eine bescheidene Sterbliche zur Handelsrepräsentantin des Imperiums wurde! Aber lasst uns nun die Damaar nicht länger belästigen, Shereen. Warum besprechen wir unsere nächsten Schritte nicht auf dem Schiff?"
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ja, geschätzte Damaar, jetzt gebt mir endlich das Zertifikat, na los!" {n}Jae überfliegt das Mercatum Tabula Officiale, und ihre Augen glitzern vor Freude.{/n} "Gepriesen sei der Erhabene, der mich durch all diese Prüfungen getragen hat, Shereen! Davon können wir später den Enkeln erzählen – wie eine bescheidene Sterbliche zur Handelsrepräsentantin des Imperiums wurde! Aber lasst uns nun die Damaar nicht länger belästigen, Shereen. Warum besprechen wir unsere nächsten Schritte nicht auf dem Schiff?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Tamam sayın damaar. Artık verseniz şu tasdiknameyi, n'olur!" {n}Jae'ın sevinçten parlayan gözleri; Mercatum Tabula Officiale'ye kilitlenmiş, fıldır fıldır dönüyor.{/n} "Çektiğim tüm çilelerde beni yarı yolda bırakmayan Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun şirinim! İşte torun torbaya anlatılacak bir şey bu... Naçizane bir fâninin İmparatorluk'ta ticaret temsilcisi oluşu! Gel, artık gidelim de damaar daha fazla rahatsız olmasın şirinim. Bundan sonraki adımlarımızı gemide konuşalım mı?"
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, esteemed damaar, give me the certificate already, come on!" {n}Jae's eyes dart over the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and shine with delight.{/n} "Praise the Exalted One who saw me through all these trials, shereen! This is something to tell the grandchildren about — how a humble mortal became a trade representative of the Imperium! Let's not bother the damaar any longer, shereen. Why don't we discuss our next steps on the ship?"

traits.locale_text: "Tamam sayın damaar. Artık verseniz şu tasdiknameyi, n'olur!" {n}Jae'ın sevinçten parlayan gözleri; Mercatum Tabula Officiale'ye kilitlenmiş, fıldır fıldır dönüyor.{/n} "Çektiğim tüm çilelerde beni yarı yolda bırakmayan Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun şirinim! İşte torun torbaya anlatılacak bir şey bu... Naçizane bir fâninin İmparatorluk'ta ticaret temsilcisi oluşu! Gel, artık gidelim de damaar daha fazla rahatsız olmasın şirinim. Bundan sonraki adımlarımızı gemide konuşalım mı?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
